ticket.title: Remove class_inheritable_attributes test from AR, already covered by AS tests
ticket.original-body: The Active Record test suite contains a case for the Class extension class_inheritable_attributes. This is an old test case that has since been (more thoroughly) covered in Active Support's suite. This patch removes the duplicated case from AR.
ticket.latest-body: The Active Record test suite contains a case for the Class extension class_inheritable_attributes. This is an old test case that has since been (more thoroughly) covered in Active Support's suite. This patch removes the duplicated case from AR.
ticket.original-body-html: The Active Record test suite contains a case for the Class extension class_inheritable_attributes. This is an old test case that has since been (more thoroughly) covered in Active Support's suite. This patch removes the duplicated case from AR.

version.body: The Active Record test suite contains a case for the Class extension class_inheritable_attributes. This is an old test case that has since been (more thoroughly) covered in Active Support's suite. This patch removes the duplicated case from AR.

version.title: Remove class_inheritable_attributes test from AR, already covered by AS tests

(from [41b3c912b769596f70d078e3b70b23fd8e98bd47]) Remove ClassInheritableAttributes test case, already covered by ActiveSupport [#3114 state:resolved]
Signed-off-by: Joshua Peek <josh@joshpeek.com> http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/41b3c912b769596f70d078e3b70b23fd8e98bd47
